item.description:
Hey Guys! For all you wine and champagne lovers....

Don't miss this FREE event and sample Some of the Best Wines and Champagnes from All Over the World at Gordon's Fine Wine & Liquors!Ttaste some the most exceptional wines from winemakers from all over the worlds including: Portugal, Spain, Argentina, New Zealand, Chili, France and Italy on October 30th, 2010 at "The Grand Tasting Event" hosted by Gordon's Fine & Liquor's Main Street location in Waltham, MA. Swirl and sip varieties with top rated scores by Wine Spectator and The Advocate. Guests can look forward to unique finds while taking advantage of an exclusive (once a year) discount of 21% on over 4,000 wines throughout the store (net items are excluded).

Gordon's Fine Wine & Liquors| 894 Main Street, Waltham, MA 02454

For more information visit www.gordonswine.com / Free with RSVP to: press@wineconnextion.com

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Tasting in Grandeur at Gordon's Fine Wine & Liquors!
